values:
finally i am moved into my apartment with ry. we moved in over this weekend and it feels so good to finally just get in here and i cant wait to get settled. its such a relief to not have to get up at 4 in the morning and drive home from ryan's house and then call him not even an hour after that. all i have to do is kick his ass out the bed. this whole week has been so hectic with working tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday and today and moving friday night and yesterday i am fucking dead. right now i am just relaxing watching the vma's and i dont have to worry about shit. our room is a mess but ya know its going to take a lil bit to get ourselves together. nothing gets put away right away, it kinda will stay in shambles for a few days. i still have more laundry to bring over and i have towels, and we need to get one more piece of furniture here but other than that we will be all set. i just cant wait till we can make this room nice and homie. we went shopping yesterday and me ry and jamieson got so much, shower liners and a new curtain, hand soap, a throw rug for our room, a shower rack for in the shower so it can hold all our stuff, new trash barrel, and we went grocery shopping. i just cant wait to get like pictures for the walls and i cant wait to get our closet set up the way we want it. however it is going to be hard splitting a closet thats not even 4 ft. across and both of us have so many things we like to hang up its going to be interesting. i just am so happy that everything has fallen into place and that now more things are going to fall into place from there.

other than the moving work has been retarded but whatever its work and i cant do anything about that,

anyway i going to watch my show and lay in bed.

i was watching crazy/beautiful the other night and most of you know the movie and probably know the beginning of the movie when she is talking. but i was listening to it and i thought that it was like the best thing ever. i think this is like the motto for my life right now. You can be anywhere when your life begins... When the future opens up in front of you... And you might not even realize it a first... But it's already happening. i dunno i am soooo corny that i love this quote. its just self explainitory. but yea thats about all i wanted to say for now.... oh and deej thanks for the talk last night i wish i could have helped you more : ( anywaysssssss lots of love, meg

You've found hope, you've found faith,
Found how fast she could take it away.
Found true love, lost your heart.
Now you don't know who you are.
She made it easy, made it free,
Made you hurt till you couldn't see.
Sometimes it stops, sometimes it flows,
But baby that is how love goes.

You will fly and you will crawl;
God knows even angels fall.
No such thing as you lost it all.
God knows even angels fall.

It's a secret no one tells;
One day it's heaven, one day it's hell.
It's no fairy tale; take it from me,
That's the way it's supposed to be.

You will fly and you will crawl;
God knows even angels fall.
No such thing as you lost it all.
God knows even angels fall.

You laugh, you cry, no one knows why
But OH the thrill of it all...
You're on the ride, you might as well
Open your eyes

You will fly and you will crawl;
God knows even angels fall.
No such thing as you lost it all.
God knows even angels fall.

Even angels fall
Even angels fall

um yea i am going home this weekend. 

things here havent been too fun lately. i'm not gonna lie. i am not happy here. but i think i need to give it a lil time

but this is the rest of my week for anyone who cares. 

thursday- no classes but i have frisbee practice at 3. then jamie, me, michelle and jena re going to the club. those are the only girls i really talk to now. 

friday- class @ 930, class @ 1030, break for an hour, class @ 1230, class @ 130 then i going home at 230/245. going to the boys soccer game at fenwick at 4 then going out and about to see people. soo excited !!!!! i get to see my dj too!!! 

then saturday seeing my meg b!!!
but i am going out
later

today could be a different day
if the sky lifts up the haze 
above my front lawn 
or just another time i hold my tears 
for another year 
on my way back home 

can i sell this sunrise, in return for a sunset yeah.. 
can i just be here one more day, until my sunburn fades away 

I've asked a hundred times what's going on 
but it went through one ear and out the other one 
why can't i take a palm tree home with me
for the memory of you when i'm at home 
I've been looking forward, months back 
vacation's everything we need... 

can i sell this sunrise, in return for a sunset yeah.. 
can i just be here one more day, until my sunburn fades away 

I'm taking pictures
of everything 
to remind me of the place that's so perfect for me 
and i'm taking pictures (taking pictures)
of everything (of everything)
so go ahead and take this place away from me 

today could be another day 
when the sky lifts up the haze 
off of my front lawn 
just another time i hold my tears 
for another year 
on my way back home

ok so i hate cleaning my room.

i just legit cleaned the whole room.

moved all my old furniture out and moved all the new furniture in. 
and i dont have a bed tonight : (

but yea this whole weekend has sucked
i spent most of it doing my veitch paper
tomorrow i have to finish it and do my app for keene state cuz hold on a tick.....i have the audition on friday.

i will be freaking out all this week. 
i don't think i am ready

and i wish i could sing my pieces through once for people who i feel have a valued opinion. 
especially since both of my songs go up to a high C and i think i am flat. and i want to be able to sing it through and have someone tell me how it honestly sounds. 

and i have one voice lesson before it. 

wednesday night at 645.

but i do love both of my pieces. 
the italian one is sooo good. 
then i am singing something from handel's messiah. wicked hard.
soo nervous!

anywho!
i hope everyone had a great weekend. 

I found advantage of bveing grounded.
~~next weekend i am going to Urban Outfitters and buying soo many new clothes con mi mama

so i have decided to change things up a bit.
i am think that i am too confined and i need to spread my wings a bit.
i want to chill with more people than the confined group i'm in now.
i want to chill with jordan, dan, veiga, jess c., doobes, jennie, and stacy more often. 
its like i never get to see them. : (

so yea i think things will be changing for me soon.
lots of love
~~megz

my head is in a weird place right now. 

i thin a lot people feel this way.

i guess now i am the bad guy. and i know that i need to stop being so defensive. 



what you said that day i gave you a ride home, really put things in persective for me. but i need help. i cant do this alone.

mostly everyone around me are so happy. andi am soo stressed out from so much stuff. 

i love all you guys, and i regret saying anything mean to you. 

this isnt worth it. we're all leaving to go to college 9/10 months. lol
it may seem far away but its going by so fast and i dont want to go leave knowing things could have been different. 



forget whatever i've said
i love you all too much to care
you are my true fit
every single one
forget regret
lets not look back and see anger
let lookforward and see the good times
i love you all


`megz

josh...my accent is real!



i dont wanna make anyone unhappy...tell me the truth please. i hate feelin like the bad guy.

ok so i saw emmanuel yesterday and i really, really liked it. one of my tops choices right now. its right around the corner from fenway. so yea it takes about 45 minutes- an hour to get there by the T. its in a wicked good area and i really like the campus. its an enclosed campus that takes up a whole city block. 5 dorms, new rec center, 2 buildings with classrooms, and a really really nice library. caf is huge and has everything. so i really love this  place. and it is part of 6 schools that kinda intertwine with each other. if emmmanuel doesnt have a course i need i can go to one of the other 5 colleges and take it there and it will still count. so thats really good.  so its in boston and thats were i really really want to be more than anywhere else. and there are so many more opportunities in the city more music than maybe in new hampshire or maine or connecticut. so i really excited. 

so then tonight i went to my brother for a bit (got an ice coffee before i went over there and now i am soo awake!)  and his best friend aaron who he went to college with works at curry college now in admissions and he told me that with my grades and SAT scores i can definately get into curry as a safety school. and ryan, my brother went there so thats a plus too, and i know aaron who will put in a good word for me. so i am in good shape there.

so tomorrow i am looking at bu...i doubt i will even get in but i want to see what their music program is like. i need to start really comparing each program. i need to narrow them down.

but yea my tour tomorrow is at 11 so i will be back in the afternoon. i am goin with my dad. kinda like a father, daughter day and we most likely will go on the tour then go to china town to eat...oh yea..lol

so call the cell anytime before 11 then anytime after 12:15 lol

if anyone want info about bu let me know. 

lots of love
~~~megz

ok i had the best day ever!!!

ok woke up late around 12:30

went to panera with my mom, and old navy....bought clothes!

then came home and chilled 

brandon called and ended up meeting at a&f

then we went to see the manchurian canididate (...like that wasnt planned) lol

so we got in the theatre and he picked the seats in the back row lol

and yea you guys can guess the rest of that.  

and then i got the kiss good night!!!!! 

and yea no one say anything about me posting this please!!! dont wanna seem like wicked retarded lol

anyway you guys can call me whenever and i'll tell you!!! 

wooooo0o0o0o00o0o0o0!!! so happy!

lots of love

~megz
